sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , DATA_CD , NNF_CL , SUPT_FMLY_RLT_CL , SUPT_FMLY_FNM , SUPT_FMLY_BHDT , CRDC_USE_AMT_SUM , CRDC_USE_AMT , CSHPT_USE_AMT , DRTP_CARD_USE_AMT , TDMR_USE_AMT , ETC_USE_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE166020 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#famResnoEncCntn# AND DATA_CD=#dataCd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , DATA_CD , NNF_CL , SUPT_FMLY_RLT_CL , SUPT_FMLY_FNM , SUPT_FMLY_BHDT , CRDC_USE_AMT_SUM , CRDC_USE_AMT , CSHPT_USE_AMT , DRTP_CARD_USE_AMT , TDMR_USE_AMT , ETC_USE_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE166020 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN DESC , DATA_CD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE166020 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
